content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Setup
Consists of the following entities:
- **Stone Furnace at position (-14.0, -49.0)**
  - Fuel: Coal (14 units)
  - Status: No ingredients to smelt
  - Inventory: Iron ore (0 units), Iron plate (0 units)
- **Stone Furnace at position (-16.0, -49.0)**
  - Fuel: Coal (15 units)
  - Status: No ingredients to smelt
  - Inventory: Iron ore (0 units), Iron plate (46 units)
- **Stone Furnace at position (-18.0, -49.0)**
  - Fuel: Coal (7 units)
  - Status: No ingredients to smelt
  - Inventory: Iron ore (0 units), Iron plate (27 units)

### Iron Plate Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- **Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -47.5)**
  - Fuel: Coal (9 units)
  - Status: Waiting for source items
  - Neighbours: Stone Furnace at (-18.0, -49.0), Stone Furnace at (-16.0, -49.0)
  - Pickup Position: (-17.5, -46.5)
  - Drop Position: (-17.5, -48.5)
- **Burner Inserter at position (-15.5, -47.5)**
  - Fuel: Coal (9 units)
  - Status: Waiting for source items
  - Neighbours: Stone Furnace at (-16.0, -49.0), Stone Furnace at (-14.0, -49.0)
  - Pickup Position: (-15.5, -46.5)
  - Drop Position: (-15.5, -48.5)
- **Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -47.5)**
  - Fuel: Coal (8 units)
  - Status: Waiting for source items
  - Neighbours: Stone Furnace at (-14.0, -49.0), Wooden Chest at (-13.5, -46.5)
  - Pickup Position: (-13.5, -46.5)
  - Drop Position: (-13.5, -48.5)
- **Wooden Chest at position (-13.5, -46.5)**
  - Inventory: Iron plate (58 units)

### Centralized Iron Plate Collection System
Consists of the following entities:

- **Burner Inserter at position (-12.5, -45.5)**

  - Drop Position: (-12.5, -44.5)
- **Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -45.5)**
  - Fuel: Coal (9 units)
  - Status: Waiting for space in destination
